customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)
customFields.Update notes:
Steve Mudie — Tuesday, March 09, 2021 9:49 AM
• Set to Active

inline.description:
Prerequisite
------------
1. Install the Demo plugin and enable it
2. Enable the webhook events by typing /demo_plugin true
3. Join the demo plugin channel for the team

User posts a message Webhook event
--------
1. Login as any user and open a channel
2. Post a message
3. Open the demo plugin channel
inline.expectedResult:
• Demo Plugin is running and ephemeral post confirms webhook events are active.
  • logs a message to the demo channel whenever a message is posted, unless by the demo plugin user itself

inline.description:
User joined a channel Webhook event
--------
1. Login as any user
2. Join a new channel where you are not yet a member
3. Open the demo plugin channel
inline.expectedResult: logs a message to the demo channel whenever a user joins a channel

inline.description:
User left a channel Webhook event
--------
1. Login as any user
2. Leave any channel where you are a member except demo plugin channel
3. Open the demo plugin channel
inline.expectedResult: logs a message to the demo channel whenever a user leaves a channel

inline.description:
User edited a message Webhook event
--------
1. Login as any user
2. Open any channel other than the demo plugin channel.
3. Edit a post and save the changes
4. Open the demo plugin channel
inline.expectedResult: logs a message to the demo channel whenever a message is edited

inline.description:
User adds a reaction to a message Webhook event
--------
1. Login as any user
2. Open any channel other than the demo plugin channel.
3. Add an emoji reaction to any post
4. Open the demo plugin channel
inline.expectedResult: logs a message to the demo channel whenever a reaction was added

inline.description:
User joined the team Webhook event
--------
1. Login as any user
2. Join a new team
3. Join the demo plugin channel for the team you joined in step 2.
inline.expectedResult: logs a message to the demo channel in the team whenever a user joins the team

inline.description:
User left a team Webhook event
--------
1. Login as any user
2. Leave any team you're a member of
3. Login as a different user who is still on the team
4. Open the demo plugin channel
inline.expectedResult: logs a message to the demo channel in the team whenever a user has left the team

inline.description:
User user login Webhook event
--------
1. Login as any user
2. Open the demo plugin channel
inline.expectedResult: Ensure that a user login event is posted that corresponds to the user login from 1.

inline.description:
User user created Webhook event
--------
1. Create a new user on the mattermost server
2. Login as any user
3. Open the demo plugin channel
inline.expectedResult: Ensure that a user creation event is posted that corresponds to the user login from 1.
